casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jerimy Rashaud LOVE 246P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Mr. Jerimy R. Love, For Love, Jerimy R. Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. Ms. Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, For the State. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of August 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal: "Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017." Ervin, J. recused
